paragraph.text: We charge a max. of 4% commission to sell a home in Portland or SW Washington, and a max. 4.5% to sell a home in Bend or Salem metro areas (this includes the buyer’s agent commission).

title: Extended Real Estate Service Area in Oregon and Washington

paragraph.text: to connect with our team’s top real estate agents throughout Oregon and Washington. In Oregon we serve over a dozen counties including the entire Portland metro area, but also all the way down the Willamette Valley to Corvallis. We also serve Bend, Oregon and surrounding Central Oregon areas. In SW Washington we serve the entirety of Clark County and Cowlitz County.

I think you will be pleasantly surprised by what you’ll find on RealEstateAgentPDX.com. Our team’s mission is to provide home buying and selling clients with top-notch customer service at a reasonable cost.  Whether you are looking to buy or sell a home in Oregon or Washington, we want to give you the best experience possible.
